   20: %%% File    : wx_class_SUITE.erl
   21: %%% Author  : Dan Gudmundsson <dan.gudmundsson@ericsson.com>
   22: %%% Description :
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Created : 13 Nov 2008 by Dan Gudmundsson <dan.gudmundsson@ericsson.com>
   25: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   26: -module(wx_class_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   29: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   30: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: 
   32: -export([calendarCtrl/1, treeCtrl/1, notebook/1, staticBoxSizer/1,
   33:          clipboard/1, helpFrame/1, htmlWindow/1, listCtrlSort/1, listCtrlVirtual/1,
   34:          radioBox/1, systemSettings/1, taskBarIcon/1, toolbar/1, popup/1, modal/1,
   35:          textCtrl/1, locale/1]).
   36: 
   37: -include("wx_test_lib.hrl").
   38: 
   39: %% Initialization functions.
   40: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     wx_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config).
   42: 
   43: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   44:     wx_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   45: 
   46: init_per_testcase(Func,Config) ->
   47:     wx_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func,Config).
   48: end_per_testcase(Func,Config) ->
   49:     wx_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func,Config).
   50: 
   51: %% SUITE specification
   52: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}, {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [calendarCtrl, treeCtrl, notebook, staticBoxSizer,
   56:      clipboard, helpFrame, htmlWindow, listCtrlSort, listCtrlVirtual,
   57:      radioBox, systemSettings, taskBarIcon, toolbar, popup, modal,
   58:      textCtrl, locale].
   59: 
   60: groups() ->
   61:     [].
   62: 
   63: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: 
   69: %% The test cases
   70: 
   71: %% create and test a calendar, especially the DateAttr no-deletition.
   72: calendarCtrl(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
   73: calendarCtrl(Config) ->
   74:     Wx = ?mr(wx_ref, wx:new()),
   75:     Frame = ?mt(wxFrame, wxFrame:new(Wx, 1, "Calendar", [])),
   76:     Panel = wxPanel:new(Frame),
   77:     Sz = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
   78: 
   79:     {YMD={_,_,Day},_} = DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(os:timestamp()),
   80:     Cal = ?mt(wxCalendarCtrl, wxCalendarCtrl:new(Panel, ?wxID_ANY,
   81: 						 [{date,DateTime}
   82: 						 ])),
   83:     wxSizer:add(Sz,Cal),
   84: 
   85:     DateAttr0 = ?mt(wxCalendarDateAttr, wxCalendarCtrl:getAttr(Cal,Day)),
   86:     case wx:is_null(DateAttr0) of
   87: 	true ->
   88: 	    ?log("DateAttr is null~n",[]);
   89: 	false ->
   90: 	    ?log("DateAttr is usable~n",[]),
   91: 	    DateAttr = ?mt(wxCalendarDateAttr, wxCalendarDateAttr:new()),
   92: 	    wxCalendarDateAttr:setBackgroundColour(DateAttr, {0,243,0}),
   93: 	    wxCalendarCtrl:setAttr(Cal, Day, DateAttr),
   94: 	    DateAttr1 = ?mt(wxCalendarDateAttr, wxCalendarCtrl:getAttr(Cal,Day)),
   95: 	    io:format("DateAttr ~p~n",[DateAttr1]),
   96: 	    ?m({0,243,0,255}, wxCalendarDateAttr:getBackgroundColour(DateAttr1))
   97:     end,
   98: 
   99:     ?m({YMD, _},wxCalendarCtrl:getDate(Cal)),
  100: 
  101:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_weekday_clicked),
  102:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_day_changed),
  103:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_month_changed),
  104:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_year_changed),
  105:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_doubleclicked),
  106:     wxCalendarCtrl:connect(Cal, calendar_sel_changed),
  107: 
  108:     wxWindow:setSizer(Panel,Sz),
  109:     wxSizer:setSizeHints(Sz,Frame),
  110:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  111: 
  112:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  113: 
  114: 
  115: treeCtrl(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  116: treeCtrl(Config) ->
  117:     Wx = wx:new(),
  118: 
  119:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  120:     Panel = wxPanel:new(Frame, []),
  121:     Tree = ?mt(wxTreeCtrl,wxTreeCtrl:new(Panel, [{style , ?wxTR_HAS_BUTTONS}])),
  122:     Root = wxTreeCtrl:addRoot(Tree, "Root", []),
  123:     ?m(true, is_integer(Root)),
  124:     Item1 = wxTreeCtrl:appendItem(Tree, Root, "Item1", []),
  125:     ?m(true, is_integer(Item1)),
  126:     ?m(ok,  wxTreeCtrl:setItemData(Tree, Item1, {data, item1})),
  127:     Item2 = wxTreeCtrl:appendItem(Tree, Root, "Item2", []),
  128:     ?m(ok,  wxTreeCtrl:setItemData(Tree, Item2, {data, item2})),
  129:     Item3 = wxTreeCtrl:appendItem(Tree, Root, "Item3", []),
  130:     ?m(ok, wxTreeCtrl:setItemData(Tree, Item3, {data, item3})),
  131: 
  132:     Sizer = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  133:     wxSizer:add(Sizer, Tree, [{flag, ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  134: 
  135:     wxWindow:setSizerAndFit(Panel, Sizer),
  136:     wxFrame:show(Frame),
  137: 
  138:     ok = wxTreeCtrl:expand(Tree, Root),
  139:     ?m([], wxTreeCtrl:getItemData(Tree, Root)),
  140:     ?m({data,item1}, wxTreeCtrl:getItemData(Tree, Item1)),
  141:     ?m({data,item2}, wxTreeCtrl:getItemData(Tree, Item2)),
  142:     ?m({data,item3}, wxTreeCtrl:getItemData(Tree, Item3)),
  143: 
  144:     {true, {X0,Y0,W0,H0}} = ?m({_,_},wxTreeCtrl:getBoundingRect(Tree, Item1, [{textOnly, true}])),
  145:     ?m({true, {_,Y1,_,_}} when Y1 > Y0, wxTreeCtrl:getBoundingRect(Tree, Item2)),
  146:     ?m({Item1, _}, wxTreeCtrl:hitTest(Tree, {X0+W0 div 2, Y0+H0 div 2})),
  147:     ?m(true, wxTreeCtrl:isTreeItemIdOk(Item1)),
  148:     ?m({0, _}, wxTreeCtrl:hitTest(Tree, {X0+W0+W0, Y0+H0+4*H0})),
  149:     ?m(false, wxTreeCtrl:isTreeItemIdOk(0)),
  150: 
  151:     wxFrame:connect(Tree, command_tree_item_expanded),
  152:     wxFrame:connect(Tree, command_tree_item_collapsed),
  153:     wxFrame:connect(Frame, close_window),
  154: 
  155:     wxTreeCtrl:editLabel(Tree, Root),
  156: 
  157: 
  158:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  159: 
  160: notebook(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  161: notebook(Config) ->
  162:     Wx = wx:new(),
  163: 
  164:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  165:     Panel = wxPanel:new(Frame, []),
  166:     Book = wxNotebook:new(Panel, ?wxID_ANY, []),
  167: 
  168:     Panel1 = wxPanel:new(Book, []),
  169:     List1 = wxListBox:new(Panel1,
  170:                           ?wxID_ANY,
  171:                           [{choices, ["aaa1", "bb1", "c1"]},
  172:                            {style,
  173:                             ?wxLB_SORT bor
  174:                             ?wxLB_NEEDED_SB bor
  175:                             ?wxLB_EXTENDED}]),
  176:     wxNotebook:addPage(Book, Panel1, "List1", []),
  177:     Sizer1 = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  178:     wxSizer:add(Sizer1, List1, [{flag, ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  179:     wxWindow:setSizer(Panel1, Sizer1),
  180: 
  181:     Panel2 = wxPanel:new(Book, []),
  182:     List2 = wxListBox:new(Panel2,
  183:                           ?wxID_ANY,
  184:                           [{choices, ["aaa2", "bb2", "c2"]},
  185:                            {style,
  186:                             ?wxLB_SORT bor
  187:                             ?wxLB_NEEDED_SB bor
  188:                             ?wxLB_EXTENDED}]),
  189:     wxNotebook:addPage(Book, Panel2, "List2", []),
  190:     Sizer2 = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  191:     wxSizer:add(Sizer2, List2, [{flag, ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  192:     wxWindow:setSizer(Panel2, Sizer2),
  193: 
  194:     Panel3 = wxPanel:new(Book, []),
  195:     List3 = wxListBox:new(Panel3,
  196:                           ?wxID_ANY,
  197:                           [{choices, ["aaa3", "bb3", "c3"]},
  198:                            {style,
  199:                             ?wxLB_SORT bor
  200:                             ?wxLB_NEEDED_SB bor
  201:                             ?wxLB_EXTENDED}]),
  202:     wxNotebook:addPage(Book, Panel3, "List3", []),
  203:     Sizer3 = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  204:     wxSizer:add(Sizer3, List3, [{flag, ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  205:     wxWindow:setSizer(Panel3, Sizer3),
  206: 
  207:     Sizer = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  208:     wxSizer:add(Sizer, Book, [{flag, ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  209: 
  210: 
  211:     wxWindow:setSizer(Panel, Sizer),
  212:     wxSizer:fit(Sizer, Frame),
  213:     wxSizer:setSizeHints(Sizer, Frame),
  214:     wxFrame:show(Frame),
  215: 
  216:     wxFrame:connect(Frame, close_window),
  217: 
  218:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  219: 
  220: staticBoxSizer(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  221: staticBoxSizer(Config) ->
  222:     Wx = wx:new(),
  223:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  224:     Panel = wxPanel:new(Frame, []),
  225:     InclSizer = ?mt(wxStaticBoxSizer,
  226: 		    wxStaticBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL, Panel,
  227: 					 [{label, "Module inclusion policy"}])),
  228:     Sizer = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  229:     wxSizer:add(Sizer, InclSizer,
  230: 		[{border, 2}, {flag, ?wxALL bor ?wxEXPAND}, {proportion, 1}]),
  231:     wxWindow:setSizerAndFit(Panel, Sizer),
  232: 
  233:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  234:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  235: 
  236: 
  237: clipboard(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  238: clipboard(Config) ->
  239:     Wx = wx:new(),
  240:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Main Frame"),
  241:     Ctrl = wxTextCtrl:new(Frame, ?wxID_ANY, [{size, {600,400}}, {style, ?wxTE_MULTILINE}]),
  242:     wxTextCtrl:connect(Ctrl, command_text_copy, [{skip, true}]),
  243:     wxTextCtrl:connect(Ctrl, command_text_cut, [{skip, true}]),
  244:     wxTextCtrl:connect(Ctrl, command_text_paste, [{skip, true}]),
  245:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  246: 
  247:     BlockWxDialogs = wxLogNull:new(),
  248: 
  249:     CB = ?mt(wxClipboard, wxClipboard:get()),
  250:     wxClipboard:usePrimarySelection(CB),
  251:     ?m(false, wx:is_null(CB)),
  252:     case wxClipboard:open(CB) of
  253: 	true ->
  254: 	    case wxClipboard:isSupported(CB, ?wxDF_TEXT) of
  255: 		false ->
  256: 		    ?log("No text on the clipboard~n",[]);
  257: 		true ->
  258: 		    Text = ?mt(wxTextDataObject, wxTextDataObject:new()),
  259: 		    case wxClipboard:getData(CB,Text) of
  260: 			true ->
  261: 			    ?log("PASTE: ~s ~n", [wxTextDataObject:getText(Text)]);
  262: 			false ->
  263: 			    ?log("Couldn't access clipboard~n",[])
  264: 		    end,
  265: 		    wxTextDataObject:destroy(Text)
  266: 	    end,
  267: 	    wxClipboard:close(CB);
  268: 	false ->
  269: 	    ?log("Clipboard open failed~n",[])
  270:     end,
  271:     case wxClipboard:open(CB) of
  272: 	true ->
  273: 	    Paste = ?mt(wxTextDataObject, wxTextDataObject:new([{text,"From Erlang"}])),
  274: 	    case wxClipboard:addData(CB,Paste) of
  275: 		true ->
  276: 		    ?log("Put text on clipboard~n", []),
  277:                     ?log("Flushing ~n",[]),
  278:                     wxClipboard:flush(CB),
  279:                     ?log("Stopping ~n",[]);
  280: 		false ->
  281: 		    ?log("Couldn't copy data to clipboard~n",[])
  282: 	    end,
  283: 	    wxClipboard:close(CB);
  284: 	false ->
  285: 	    ?log("Clipboard open failed~n",[])
  286:     end,
  287:     wxLogNull:destroy(BlockWxDialogs),
  288:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  289: 
  290: 
  291: helpFrame(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  292: helpFrame(Config) ->
  293:     Wx = wx:new(),
  294:     MFrame = wx:batch(fun() ->
  295: 			      MFrame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Main Frame"),
  296: 			      wxPanel:new(MFrame, [{size, {600,400}}]),
  297: 			      wxFrame:connect(MFrame, show),
  298: 			      wxWindow:show(MFrame),
  299: 			      MFrame
  300: 		      end),
  301:     receive #wx{event=#wxShow{}} -> ok
  302:     after 1000 -> exit(show_timeout)
  303:     end,
  304: 
  305:     {X0, Y0} = wxWindow:getScreenPosition(MFrame),
  306:     {X, Y, W,H} = wxWindow:getScreenRect(MFrame),
  307:     io:format("Pos0: ~p ~p ~p Pos: ~p:~p Size: ~p:~p ~n",
  308: 	      [X0,Y0, wxWindow:clientToScreen(MFrame, {0,0}), X,Y,W,H]),
  309: 
  310:     Pos = {X+5, Y+(H div 2)},
  311:     Size = {W-10, (H div 2) - 5},
  312: 
  313:     Comp = wxFrame:new(MFrame, ?wxID_ANY, "Completion Window",
  314: 		       [{pos, Pos}, {size, Size},
  315: 			{style, ?wxFRAME_FLOAT_ON_PARENT}]),
  316:     LB = wxListBox:new(Comp, 42, [{style, ?wxLB_SINGLE},
  317: 				  {size, Size}]),
  318: 
  319:     Items = ["Item " ++ integer_to_list(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  320:     wxListBox:insertItems(LB,Items,0),
  321: 
  322:     wxWindow:show(Comp),
  323:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(MFrame,Config).
  324: 
  325: htmlWindow(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  326: htmlWindow(Config) ->
  327:     Wx = wx:new(),
  328:     {MFrame,HPanel} =
  329: 	wx:batch(fun() ->
  330: 			 MFrame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Main Frame"),
  331: 			 HPanel = wxHtmlWindow:new(MFrame, [{size, {600,400}}]),
  332: 			 wxWindow:show(MFrame),
  333: 			 {MFrame, HPanel}
  334: 		 end),
  335:     timer:sleep(9),
  336: 
  337:     WxMod = code:which(wx),
  338:     WxDir = filename:split(filename:dirname(WxMod)) -- ["ebin"],
  339:     Html = filename:join(filename:join(WxDir),filename:join("doc", "html")),
  340: 
  341:     Index = filename:join(Html, "wx.html"),
  342: 
  343:     ?m(ok, wxHtmlWindow:connect(HPanel, command_html_link_clicked,
  344: 				[{callback,
  345: 				  fun(Ev,_) ->
  346: 					  io:format("Link clicked: ~p~n",[Ev])
  347: 				  end}])),
  348: 
  349:     case filelib:is_file(Index) of
  350: 	true ->
  351: 	    ?m(true, wxHtmlWindow:loadFile(HPanel, Index)),
  352: 	    ok;
  353: 	false ->
  354: 	    ok
  355:     end,
  356: 
  357:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(MFrame,Config).
  358: 
  359: 
  360: listCtrlSort(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  361: listCtrlSort(Config) ->
  362:     Wx = wx:new(),
  363:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  364: 
  365:     LC = wxListCtrl:new(Frame, [{style, ?wxLC_REPORT}]),
  366: 
  367:     %% must be done crashes in wxwidgets otherwise.
  368:     wxListCtrl:insertColumn(LC, 0, "Column"),
  369: 
  370:     Add = fun(Int) ->
  371: 		  wxListCtrl:insertItem(LC, Int, "ABC " ++ integer_to_list(Int)),
  372: 		  %% ItemData Can only be integers currently
  373: 		  wxListCtrl:setItemData(LC, Int, abs(50-Int))
  374: 	  end,
  375: 
  376:     wx:foreach(Add, lists:seq(0,50)),
  377:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  378: 
  379:     timer:sleep(1000),
  380: 
  381:     Sort = fun() ->
  382: 		   wxListCtrl:sortItems(LC, fun(A, B) ->
  383: 						    %% io:format("S ~p ~p ~n",[A,B]),
  384: 						    if A =:= B ->  0;
  385: 						       A < B   -> -1;
  386: 						       true    ->  1
  387: 						    end
  388: 					    end)
  389: 	   end,
  390: 
  391:     Time = timer:tc(erlang, apply, [Sort,[]]),
  392:     io:format("Sorted ~p ~n",[Time]),
  393: 
  394:     Item = wxListItem:new(),
  395: 
  396:     %% Test that wx-asserts are sent to error logger
  397:     %% Force an assert on 3.0 (when debug compiled which it is by default)
  398:     wxListItem:setId(Item, 200),
  399:     case os:type() of
  400: 	{win32, _} ->
  401: 	    wxListItem:setColumn(Item, 3),
  402: 	    io:format("Got ~p ~n", [wxListCtrl:insertItem(LC, Item)]),
  403: 	    wxListItem:setColumn(Item, 0);
  404: 	_ -> %% Uses generic listctrl
  405: 	    %% we can't use the code above on linux with wx-2.8.8 because it segfaults.
  406: 	    io:format("Got ~p ~n", [wxListCtrl:getItem(LC, Item)])
  407:     end,
  408: 
  409:     wxListItem:setMask(Item, ?wxLIST_MASK_TEXT),
  410:     _List = wx:map(fun(Int) ->
  411: 			   wxListItem:setId(Item, Int),
  412: 			   ?m(true, wxListCtrl:getItem(LC, Item)),
  413: 			   io:format("~p: ~s~n",[Int, wxListItem:getText(Item)])
  414: 		   end, lists:seq(0,10)),
  415: 
  416:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  417: 
  418: listCtrlVirtual(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  419: listCtrlVirtual(Config) ->
  420:     Wx = wx:new(),
  421:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  422:     IA = wxListItemAttr:new(),
  423:     wxListItemAttr:setTextColour(IA, {190, 25, 25}),
  424:     Style = ?wxLC_SINGLE_SEL bor ?wxLC_REPORT bor ?wxLC_VIRTUAL bor
  425:         ?wxLC_HRULES bor ?wxHSCROLL bor ?wxVSCROLL,
  426:     %% Assert signed consts (wxVSCROLL)
  427:     Style = wxe_util:get_const(wxLC_SINGLE_SEL) bor wxe_util:get_const(wxLC_REPORT) bor
  428:         wxe_util:get_const(wxLC_VIRTUAL) bor wxe_util:get_const(wxLC_HRULES) bor wxe_util:get_const(wxHSCROLL)
  429:         bor wxe_util:get_const(wxVSCROLL),
  430: 
  431:     LC = wxListCtrl:new(Frame,
  432: 			[{style, Style},
  433: 			 {onGetItemText, fun(_This, Item, 0) ->
  434: 						 "Row " ++ integer_to_list(Item);
  435: 					    (_, Item, 1) when Item rem 5 == 0 ->
  436: 						 "Column 2";
  437: 					    (_, _, _) -> ""
  438: 					 end},
  439: 			 {onGetItemAttr, fun(_This, Item) when Item rem 3 == 0 ->
  440: 						 IA;
  441: 					    (_This, _Item)  ->
  442: 						 wx:typeCast(wx:null(), wxListItemAttr)
  443: 					 end},
  444: 			 {onGetItemColumnImage, fun(_This, Item, 1) ->
  445: 							Item rem 4;
  446: 						   (_, _, _) ->
  447: 							-1
  448: 						end}
  449: 			]),
  450: 
  451:     IL = wxImageList:new(16,16),
  452:     wxImageList:add(IL, wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_COPY", [{size, {16,16}}])),
  453:     wxImageList:add(IL, wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_MISSING_IMAGE", [{size, {16,16}}])),
  454:     wxImageList:add(IL, wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_TICK_MARK", [{size, {16,16}}])),
  455:     wxImageList:add(IL, wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_CROSS_MARK", [{size, {16,16}}])),
  456:     wxListCtrl:assignImageList(LC, IL, ?wxIMAGE_LIST_SMALL),
  457: 
  458:     wxListCtrl:insertColumn(LC, 0, "Column 1"),
  459:     wxListCtrl:insertColumn(LC, 1, "Column 2"),
  460:     wxListCtrl:setColumnWidth(LC, 0, 200),
  461:     wxListCtrl:setColumnWidth(LC, 1, 200),
  462:     wxListCtrl:setItemCount(LC, 1000000),
  463: 
  464:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  465:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  466: 
  467: 
  468: radioBox(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  469: radioBox(Config) ->
  470:     Wx = wx:new(),
  471:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  472: 
  473:     TrSortRadioBox = wxRadioBox:new(Frame, ?wxID_ANY, "Sort by:",
  474: 				    {100, 100},{100, 100},
  475: 				    ["Timestamp", "Session", "FooBar"]),
  476: 
  477:     io:format("TrSortRadioBox ~p ~n", [TrSortRadioBox]),
  478:     wxRadioBox:setSelection(TrSortRadioBox, 2),
  479:     wxRadioBox:setItemToolTip(TrSortRadioBox, 2, "Test"),
  480:     TT0 = ?mt(wxToolTip,wxRadioBox:getItemToolTip(TrSortRadioBox, 0)),
  481:     TT1 = ?mt(wxToolTip,wxRadioBox:getItemToolTip(TrSortRadioBox, 2)),
  482:     ?m(true, wx:is_null(TT0)),
  483:     ?m("Test", wxToolTip:getTip(TT1)),
  484:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  485:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  486: 
  487: 
  488: systemSettings(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  489: systemSettings(Config) ->
  490:     Wx = wx:new(),
  491:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  492: 
  493:     ?m({_,_,_,_}, wxSystemSettings:getColour(?wxSYS_COLOUR_DESKTOP)),
  494:     ?mt(wxFont, wxSystemSettings:getFont(?wxSYS_SYSTEM_FONT)),
  495:     ?m(true, is_integer(wxSystemSettings:getMetric(?wxSYS_MOUSE_BUTTONS))),
  496:     ?m(true, is_integer(wxSystemSettings:getScreenType())),
  497: 
  498:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  499:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  500: 
  501: 
  502: textCtrl(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  503: textCtrl(Config) ->
  504:     Wx = wx:new(),
  505:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  506: 
  507:     TC = ?mt(wxTextCtrl, wxTextCtrl:new(Frame, ?wxID_ANY, [{style, ?wxTE_MULTILINE bor ?wxTE_RICH2}])),
  508:     wxTextCtrl:appendText(TC, "This line is in default color\n"),
  509:     Attr = ?mt(wxTextAttr, wxTextAttr:new(?wxRED)),
  510:     wxTextCtrl:setDefaultStyle(TC, Attr),
  511:     wxTextCtrl:appendText(TC, "This line is in ?wxRED color\n"),
  512:     wxTextAttr:setTextColour(Attr, ?wxBLACK),
  513:     wxTextCtrl:setDefaultStyle(TC, Attr),
  514:     wxTextCtrl:appendText(TC, "This line is in ?wxBLACK color\n"),
  515:     Default = wxSystemSettings:getColour(?wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWTEXT),
  516:     wxTextAttr:setTextColour(Attr, Default),
  517:     wxTextCtrl:setDefaultStyle(TC, Attr),
  518:     wxTextCtrl:appendText(TC, "This line is in default color\n"),
  519:     wxTextAttr:destroy(Attr),
  520:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  521:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  522: 
  523: taskBarIcon(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  524: taskBarIcon(Config) ->
  525:     Wx = wx:new(),
  526:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  527:     TBI = wxTaskBarIcon:new(),
  528:     Image = wxImage:new(filename:join(code:priv_dir(debugger), "erlang_bug.png")),
  529:     io:format("Image ~p~n",[wxImage:ok(Image)]),
  530:     Icon = wxIcon:new(filename:join(code:priv_dir(debugger), "erlang_bug.png"), [{type, ?wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG}]),
  531:     wxTaskBarIcon:setIcon(TBI, Icon, [{tooltip, "Testing wxTaskBarIcon"}]),
  532:     wxWindow:show(Frame),
  533:     wxTaskBarIcon:connect(TBI, taskbar_left_down, [{callback, fun(Ev,_) -> io:format("Left clicked: ~p~n",[Ev]) end}]),
  534:     wxTaskBarIcon:connect(TBI, taskbar_right_down, [{callback,fun(Ev,_) -> io:format("Right clicked: ~p~n",[Ev]) end}]),
  535:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  536: 
  537: toolbar(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  538: toolbar(Config) ->
  539:     Wx = wx:new(),
  540:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  541:     TB = wxFrame:createToolBar(Frame),
  542:     BM1 = wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_COPY", [{size, {16,16}}, {client, "wxART_TOOLBAR"}]),
  543:     BM2 = wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_TICK_MARK", [{size, {16,16}}, {client, "wxART_TOOLBAR"}]),
  544:     wxToolBar:addTool(TB, 747, "PressMe", BM1,
  545: 		      [{shortHelp, "Press Me"}]),
  546:     catch wxToolBar:addStretchableSpace(TB),  %% wxWidgets 3.0 only
  547:     Add = fun(#wx{}, _) ->
  548: 		  wxToolBar:addTool(TB, -1, "Added", BM2,
  549: 				    [{shortHelp, "Test 2 popup text"}]),
  550: 		  catch wxToolBar:addStretchableSpace(TB), %% wxWidgets 3.0 only
  551: 		  wxToolBar:realize(TB)
  552: 	  end,
  553: 
  554:     wxToolBar:realize(TB),
  555:     wxFrame:connect(Frame, command_menu_selected, [{callback, Add}, {id, 747}]),
  556:     wxFrame:show(Frame),
  557:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  558: 
  559: popup(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  560: popup(Config) ->
  561:     Wx = wx:new(),
  562:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, ?wxID_ANY, "Frame"),
  563:     TB = wxFrame:createToolBar(Frame),
  564:     wxToolBar:addTool(TB, 747, "PressMe", wxArtProvider:getBitmap("wxART_COPY", [{size, {16,16}}]),
  565: 		      [{shortHelp, "Press Me"}]),
  566: 
  567:     Log = fun(#wx{id=Id, event=Ev}, Obj) ->
  568: 		  io:format("Got ~p from ~p~n", [Ev, Id]),
  569: 		  wxEvent:skip(Obj)
  570: 	  end,
  571:     CreatePopup = fun() ->
  572: 			  Pop = wxPopupTransientWindow:new(Frame),
  573: 			  Panel = wxPanel:new(Pop),
  574: 			  Sz = wxBoxSizer:new(?wxVERTICAL),
  575: 			  wxSizer:add(Sz, wxButton:new(Panel, 42, [{label, "A button"}])),
  576: 			  wxSizer:add(Sz, Txt = wxStaticText:new(Panel, 43, "Some static text")),
  577: 			  wxSizer:add(Sz, wxButton:new(Panel, 44, [{label, "B button"}])),
  578: 			  wxPanel:setSizerAndFit(Panel, Sz),
  579: 			  wxSizer:setSizeHints(Sz, Pop),
  580: 			  wxWindow:connect(Pop, command_button_clicked, [{callback, Log}]),
  581: 			  wxWindow:connect(Txt, left_up, [{callback, Log}]),
  582: 			  wxWindow:connect(Txt, middle_up, [{callback, Log}]),
  583: 			  wxWindow:connect(Txt, right_up, [{callback, Log}]),
  584: 			  wxWindow:connect(Pop, show, [{callback, Log}]),
  585: 			  Pos = wx_misc:getMousePosition(),
  586: 			  wxPopupTransientWindow:position(Pop, Pos, {-1, -1}),
  587: 			  wxPopupTransientWindow:popup(Pop),
  588: 			  Pop
  589: 		  end,
  590:     wxFrame:connect(Frame, command_menu_selected, [{id, 747}]),
  591:     wxFrame:connect(Frame, show),
  592:     wxFrame:show(Frame),
  593:     receive #wx{event=#wxShow{}} -> ok
  594:     after 1000 -> exit(show_timeout)
  595:     end,
  596: 
  597:     Pop = CreatePopup(),
  598:     Scale = case wx_test_lib:user_available(Config) of
  599: 		true -> 25;
  600: 		false -> 1
  601: 	    end,
  602:     receive
  603: 	#wx{} -> CreatePopup()
  604:     after 200*Scale ->
  605: 	    wxPopupTransientWindow:dismiss(Pop)
  606:     end,
  607:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  608: 
  609: locale(TestInfo) when is_atom(TestInfo) -> wx_test_lib:tc_info(TestInfo);
  610: locale(_Config) ->
  611:     wx:new(),
  612:     io:format("SystemEncoding: ~p~n",[wxLocale:getSystemEncoding()]),
  613:     io:format("SystemEncodingName: ~ts~n",[wxLocale:getSystemEncodingName()]),
  614:     io:format("SystemLanguage: ~p~n",[wxLocale:getSystemLanguage()]),
  615:     io:format("SystemLanguageName: ~p~n",[wxLocale:getLanguageName(wxLocale:getSystemLanguage())]),
  616:     lang_env(),
  617:     LC = wxLocale:new(),
  618:     %% wxLocale:addCatalog(LC, "wxstd"),
  619:     io:format("Swedish: ~p~n",[wxLocale:getLanguageName(?wxLANGUAGE_SWEDISH)]),
  620:     R0 = wxLocale:init(LC, [{language, ?wxLANGUAGE_SWEDISH}, {flags, 0}]),
  621:     io:format("initiated ~p~n",[R0]),
  622:     lang_env(),
  623:     ok.
  624: %% wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  625: 
  626: lang_env() ->
  627:     Env0 = os:getenv(),
  628:     Env = [[R,"\n"]||R <- Env0],
  629:     %%io:format("~p~n",[lists:sort(Env)]),
  630:     Opts = [global, multiline, {capture, all, list}, unicode],
  631:     format_env(re:run(Env, "LC_ALL.*", Opts)),
  632:     format_env(re:run(Env, "^LANG.*=.*$", Opts)),
  633:     ok.
  634: format_env({match, List}) ->
  635:     [io:format("  ~ts~n",[L]) || L <- List];
  636: format_env(nomatch) -> ok.
  637: 
  638: %%  Add a testcase that tests that we can recurse in showModal
  639: %%  because it hangs in observer if object are not destroyed correctly
  640: %%  when popping the stack
  641: modal(Config) ->
  642:     Wx = wx:new(),
  643:     Frame = wxFrame:new(Wx, -1, "Test Modal windows"),
  644:     wxFrame:show(Frame),
  645:     Env = wx:get_env(),
  646:     Upd = wxUpdateUIEvent:getUpdateInterval(),
  647:     wxUpdateUIEvent:setUpdateInterval(200),
  648:     Tester = spawn_link(fun() -> modal_test(Env) end),
  649:     D1 = wxTextEntryDialog:new(Frame, "Dialog 1"),
  650:     ShowCB = fun(#wx{event=Ev},_) ->
  651:                      case Ev of
  652:                          #wxShow{show=true} ->
  653:                              Tester ! {dialog, self(), D1},
  654:                              receive continue ->
  655:                                      D2 = wxTextEntryDialog:new(Frame, "Dialog 2"),
  656:                                      Tester ! {dialog, self(), D2},
  657:                                      Tester ! {dialog_done, self(), wxDialog:showModal(D2)}
  658:                              end;
  659:                          _ ->
  660:                              ignore
  661:                      end
  662:              end,
  663:     wxDialog:connect(D1, show, [{callback, ShowCB}]),
  664:     ?wxID_OK = wxDialog:showModal(D1),
  665:     wxUpdateUIEvent:setUpdateInterval(Upd),
  666:     wx_test_lib:wx_destroy(Frame,Config).
  667: 
  668: %%
  669: %%  Add sleep before continuing so we recurse from
  670: %%  wxe_impl::dispatch_cb() to wxe_impl::dispatch() (with idle commands)
  671: %%  and handle events there so the queue should be reset and started from 0.
  672: %%
  673: modal_test(Env) ->
  674:     wx:set_env(Env),
  675:     receive
  676:         {dialog, CBpid, D1} ->
  677:             timer:sleep(500),
  678:             CBpid ! continue,
  679:             ?wxID_CANCEL = modal_test2(CBpid),
  680:             wxDialog:endModal(D1, ?wxID_OK)
  681:     end.
  682: 
  683: modal_test2(CBpid) ->
  684:     receive
  685:         {dialog, CBpid, D2} ->
  686:             timer:sleep(500),
  687:             wxDialog:endModal(D2, ?wxID_CANCEL),
  688:             receive {dialog_done, CBpid, Res} -> Res end
  689:     end.
